page.title: 14Abbotsley Feast Week
page.content: (continued from page 13) We get steam engines coming.All that week the village is decorated with buntings.Chiltern radio and Anglia TV are approached to see if they can help with publicity.Posters are put up in St Neots and Gamlingay and nearby villages.The Jolly Abbot,the local restaurant,has agreed to provide refreshments.After the fete there is a barbeque where we have Morris Dancing, Parachutists and Fire eaters and the raffle is drawn.There is a committee which organises it all. The Youth club and Young farmers also entertain us on different days of the week,and we have a Cricket match.On the Sunday there is an important service celebrating St Margaret's day,where successful children are presented with their Chorister Blue Ribbons.
